Class UsersManagment

java.lang.Object
Users.UsersManagment
public class UsersManagment extends Object
This class is responsible for managing a collection of User objects. It allows adding, removing, and editing users within the system.

The UsersManagment class provides methods to handle user data, including: adding a new user, removing an existing user, and editing the details of an existing user. This class serves as the central point for managing the users within the system.

    • editUser

      public void editUser(User user, User editedUser)
      Edits an existing user's information in the system. The user's username, email, and password will be updated based on the details of the provided edited user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object to edit
      editedUser - the User object containing the new details
